/*
 * TheNumberGame.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 15-Jun-2011
 *      Author: Jivitesh
 */

#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;

int compare(string a, string b) {
	int l1 = a.length();
	int l2 = b.length();

	for (int k=0; k<min(l1,l2); k++) {
		if (a[k] < b[k]) {
			return 1;
		}
		else if (a[k] > b[k]) {
			return -1;
		}
	}

	if (l1 == l2)
		return 0;
	else if (l2 > l1 && b[l1] >= a[l1-1]){
		//	System.out.println(num.toString() + " " + o.num.toString());
		return 1;
	}
	else
		return -1;
}

int main() {

	int numCases;
	scanf("%d", &numCases);

	while(numCases > 0){

		int numWords;
		scanf("%d", &numWords);

		vector<string> numList(numWords);
		int i,j;

		for(i=0; i<numWords; i++){
			cin>>numList[i];
		}

		for(i=0; i<numWords; i++){
			for(j=0; j<numWords-1; j++){

				if (compare(numList[j],numList[j+1]) == 1) {
					swap(numList[j],numList[j+1]);
				}

			}
		}


		string s;

		for (int i = 0; i < numList.size(); i++) {
			s += numList[i];
		}
		cout << s << endl;

		numCases--;
	}

}
